name: Mouth House
description:
Touches: Q/D or Left/Right arrow to left or right   +   space to jump

Mouth House is a little game for Halloween.

You find a house in a forest, you decide to discover this old house.

However this house have lights and isn't too old .

This corridor is infinite?

No time to ask question, a giant black mouth appear behind you!

Only one solution, RUN!!!!
